summary:
Demonstrated expertise in providing exceptional customer support for a leading auto parts export e-commerce company based in Chengdu, China. Currently serving as a senior Customer Specialist at HIH Logistics in the Netherlands.

Skills And Experiences：
Customer Experience Communication: Proficient in effectively communicating with customers to provide exceptional service throughout their journey. Skilled in actively listening to customer needs, addressing inquiries, and resolving issues promptly and courteously.

Customer Relationship Management: Demonstrated ability to build and maintain strong customer relationships based on trust and reliability. Experienced in fostering positive interactions and ensuring customer satisfaction to drive long-term loyalty and repeat business.

Multilingual Proficiency: Multilingual proficiency in English and Chinese languages, Currently I am also following Dutch courses., enabling clear and effective communication with customers from diverse backgrounds and regions.

Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills, allowing for the timely resolution of customer concerns. Capable of analyzing situations, identifying solutions, and implementing effective strategies to meet customer needs.

Attention to Detail: Exceptional attention to detail, ensuring accuracy in handling customer orders, documentation, and shipment tracking. Diligent in maintaining precise records and adhering to quality standards.

Collaboration: Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams, including logistics, warehouse, and transportation partners, to ensure seamless order fulfillment and on-time deliveries. Skilled in coordinating efforts and sharing information to achieve optimal customer outcomes.

Process Improvement: Proactive in identifying opportunities for process optimization and efficiency enhancement within customer service operations. Experienced in contributing to the development and implementation of improved procedures and practices.

Time Management: Proficient in managing multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced environment. Capable of meeting tight deadlines while maintaining high-quality customer service standards.
